Title: Passion (2011)
Plot: 'Passion' is the story of Jack Passion, a lone spy who must face a global threat that may wreak havoc upon all Americans.
Based on the story The Garden of Forking Paths, Passion is a classic spy movie with all the trappings of a classic spy novel. Full of intrigue and contrivance, Passion brings a classic spy hero to life who must face the ultimate challenge- to avert a nuclear war and rely solely on his survival skills to cope with his mission.
Jack must act fast to stop the terrorists before they are able to carry out their devious plan. Will Jack win out in the end? Or will the terrorists get the upper hand? Find out in this highly intense original movie that is the standard of all spy movies. And unite for a hero
